title: Punished by Daddy
description: After Holly is caught with her boyfriend, her mom drops her off at her dad's cabin in the middle of Montana. Daddy takes over, trying out different punishments to teach Holly how to control her urges. Holly and her Daddy bond quickly as she works hard to be the good girl he wants her to be.After Holly is caught with her boyfriend, her mom drops her off at her dad's cabin in the middle of Montana. Daddy takes over, trying out different punishments to teach Holly how to control her urges. Holly and her Daddy bond quickly as she works hard to be the good girl he wants her to be.
author: Abby Harrison
